general_advisory: Farmers are advised to take necessary precautions and follow the recommended practices for optimal crop growth and livestock management

advisory: False smut disease may be seen in paddy field. To manage the same, spray Propiconazole or Copper oxychloride in water per acre.
Neck Blast diseases can be controlled by draining excess water from the paddy field and spraying suitable fungicides.
Top dressing of fertilizer for maize crop has started.
Sugarcane is at grand growth stage.
Cotton crop is in boll formation stage.
Pod borer infestation may occur in black gram. Use recommended insecticides for management.
Pod borer infestation may occur in green gram. Use recommended insecticides for management.
Seed treatment should be done before sowing seeds.
To manage the infestation of Fruit flies, use appropriate insecticides.
To control Powdery mildew disease, spray recommended fungicides.
Reduce Phomopsis blight disease by spraying recommended fungicides.
Liver fluke infestation in sheep requires treatment with specific drugs.
Hide-bound oedema in aged animals may indicate liver worm infestation.
Liver fluke infestation in goats requires treatment with specific drugs.
Inspection of faecal samples is recommended for diagnosis.
